context:
Anomalous energy signature detected on planet surface, sector 7-G
Deep scan complete: - Electromagnetic: Structured patterns detected, possible technology - Subspace: Minimal distortion, no active fields - Energy output: 2.3 terawatts, pulsing at 0.7Hz intervals - Composition: Unable to determine, interference present
Captain, I'm picking up a faint transmission on a carrier wave matching that pulse frequency. It's... it's mathematical sequences. Prime numbers.
Primary Directive: Investigate signs of intelligent life Secondary: Maintain crew and ship safety Current Mission Duration: 342 days
Interesting. That energy signature wasn't there during our initial orbital scan.
Lieutenant Rodriguez, can you get me more details on that anomaly? Run a deep scan on sector 7-G, focusing on electromagnetic and subspace frequencies.
7-G electromagnetic,subspace
Commander Chen, maintain our current orbit but be ready to break away if needed.
Decoding mathematical sequence... Identified: Prime numbers 2 through 127 Additional patterns detected, analysis ongoing
Ship-wide announcement delivered Science teams acknowledging
Prime numbers? That's a clear sign of intelligence. This changes everything.
All stop. Lt. Rodriguez, record everything. Commander Chen, can you isolate and clean up that transmission?
Arriving on bridge with xenobiology team
Power reserves optimal, ready for extended operations
Arriving on bridge with xenobiology team
Power reserves optimal, ready for extended operations
0.7Hz prime_sequence
And open a ship-wide channel.
ship_wide All hands, this is the Captain. We may have just made first contact. All departments prepare for extended station keeping. Science teams to the bridge.
This is what we've been searching for. After nearly a year in deep space, we might have found intelligent life. Need to proceed carefully - this could be automated, ancient, or active. The crew is excited but I need to keep them focused.
Dr. Tanaka, good timing. Look at this pattern - prime numbers broadcast at regular intervals. What's your assessment?
I should record this in my personal log. This could be a historic moment.
Captain's Eyes Only
Captain's Log, Stardate 51234.5. We've detected what appears to be an artificial signal - prime numbers. This could be the discovery we've been searching for.
